welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lawton, a charming city known for its rich Native American history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lawton has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Henry Post AAF Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Henry Post AAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport provides customs and immigration services for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Halliburton Field Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Halliburton Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
